Just for you delahaya, I vow to burn a bible on both easter and xmas!

Many thanks to JustPirateBay2010 for putting these resources up here.  My kids are already being indoctrinated with the "Theory of Evolution" as if it were fact, when in fact there is more evidence to support the belief that Darth Vader is our Grandfather, and that we were born on the Death Star, than this garbage about being somehow descended from Lucy and a bunch of cartoon drawings the evolutionists use to prop up their flimsy ideas.  If at one time there were millions of primates, and now there are billions of people, logic dictates that more than one or two "missing links" would be found. There should be graveyards full of civilizations. But that begs the question of where life came from in the first place.  Time plus chance do not make life. Intelligence must be added to the formula, Peace Out
